alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 10:19PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calcasieu Parish through 1100 PM CST... At 1019 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over portions of Calcasieu Parish, including the city of Lake Charles, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Lake Charles Regional Airport and Holmwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 37 and 40. Interstate 210 between mile markers 6 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
